ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Re: Stun/root
ygData.msgSnippet: ... The Eqcaster numbers are from picking apart the spdata.eff file.  Sometimes it seems spot on, other times it looks nothing like what I see in the game.  I
ygData.messageBody:
On Thu, 9 Mar 2000, Eric Boller wrote:
>
> At level 60? How does anyone know what this song does
> at level 60? I've never even seen someone who knew
> the formula that figures out the effects. Not saying
> it is wrong either, but heck I figure John would know
> the formula if anyone, and it looks like he doesn't.

The Eqcaster numbers are from picking apart the spdata.eff
file. Sometimes it seems spot on, other times it looks
nothing like what I see in the game. I suspect the numbers in
it are used to generate client-side effects, while the server
does the real thing which is sometimes different. The data in
the file accounts for levels up to 60, probably in preparation
for the expansion.

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
